input.sentences: we prepared for the graduation ceremony to start .

output.sentences: They prepared early for graduation because it will start.
The students all gathered in the main hall.
Afterwords they walked down the road.
Outside the valedictorian gave a speech to all the students.
Lastly the students threw their caps in the air.
